about_the_game:
When you kiss the girl that you like, you're transported to a different dimension... literally.

Jake's Paralysis is a Live2D animated Visual Novel, that takes place in the 90s, where you make choices that will lead you to different endings. You can either date the popular girl you just met at the University, your childhood friend in the 90s, or their dark and mysterious versions of the 20s... it's up to you!




You move to the big city with your best friend, Lucy, to make your dreams come true. There, you meet Nina, a bold femme fatale who will turn your world upside down!

When both seem interested, you try to understand your messy feelings for each other and make a final choice, but something unexpected happens...

A kiss will make you travel in time to a small room surrounded by cigarette smoke... and gangsters from the 20s running after you!

"Why am I in the prohibition era? Who are these people? And, how do I get back home?!"


  • Animated characters in Live2D with over 40 expressions per character.
  • Animated backgrounds.
  • Two worlds.
  • Two love interests in each world that branch into 4 possible endings.
  • 15,000 words in the demo.
  • Strong musical theme.
  • Set in the 90s and 20s.
  • Slow progression from a casual environment to a darker one with more mature themes than those initially proposed.
  • Working on fan translation.

name: Jake's Paralysis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Older
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1060 or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Breath-taking Visual Novel that will make you travel between two worlds with a kiss. Follow Jake back and forth from the 90s to the prohibition era in the 20s and make choices that will determine his fate.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
